events.message: The insured reported a vehicle collision on the highway that resulted in significant front-end damage to their car.
Upon review, the claim has been categorized under Auto Accident due to the involvement of a personal vehicle collision.
A claims agent was assigned to the case to assist the claimant throughout the claims process for their car accident.
The claim was formally acknowledged by our department and confirmation was sent to the insured immediately.
To proceed, the insured was requested to submit a copy of the police report and vehicle damage photographs.
The insured promptly provided all requested documents, including the police accident report and repair estimates.
The investigation team initiated a thorough review of all submitted evidence related to the auto accident claim.
Investigation concluded confirming the claim's validity and the extent of damage to the insured vehicle.
A settlement offer was proposed that covers repair costs and rental reimbursement as per policy terms.
The customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the handling process.
The claim was officially approved after acceptance of the settlement offer and final confirmation from claimant.
The settlement payment was successfully issued to the insured's account to cover all authorized repair expenses.
Following payment issuance, the claim was closed and notification was sent confirming the completion of the process.
All claim documents and correspondence were archived in the system for future reference and audit compliance.
